alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Oglala Lakota; Southern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 20 at 8:25PM MDT until April 21 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...The Southern Foot Hills, the Custer County Plains, the Fall River County Plains, Oglala Lakota County and the Hermosa Foot Hills. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...Until midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Oglala Lakota; Southern Foot Hills
